name: osg-project
description: The Open Source Game project is a joint effort between Preponderous Software and the Fairfield Programming Association to create an open source game which will serve as reference material for new developers.

what is the role of preponderous softwar.text: Preponderous Software is leading development on this project and will be focusing on core elements such as player control, gameplay, story, UI, etc.

what is the role of the fairfield progra.text: The FPA is focusing on community management, deadlines, publishing, press, advertisement and will be providing general assistance with development.

planning document.text: The planning document can be found [here](PLANNING.md).
